comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I've located two George W Riddles whose dates might fit the bill. 1. From Texas -- George W Riddle. b.1861 genealogytrails.com/tex/prairieslakes/dewitt/georgewriddl... biography from History of Texas and Texans, Volume 3, Francis White Johnson, 1914 [another transcription is at archiver.rootsweb.ancestry.com/th/read/OBITUARIES/2008-11... but it is not an obituary] Abbeville progress., November 07, 1914, page 3 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn88064057/1914-11-07/ed-... has a piece about Judge George W Riddle, president of Texas State Bank of Dallas, furnishing free seed corn 2. From Pennsylvania and Maryland. George Washington Riddle www.ewingfamilyassociation.org/EGD_Project/James_of_Inch/... This detailed genealogical resource includes a portrait from 1890 which could be the same man. But I have no idea why he might have been in the news.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I've found more on (1). He was also George Washington Riddle and ran for the U.S. Senate in 1916, according to familytreemaker.genealogy.com/users/r/i/d/Robert-L-Riddle...
